name: Crash Bandicoot Collectors' Edition
summary: Crash Bandicoot Collectors' Edition is a bundle containing Crash Bandicoot 3: Warped, Crash Team Racing, and Crash Bash. The Collector's Edition features the final two Naughty Dog Crash Bandicoot games as well as Eurocom's Crash Bash. Each game disc is silver with a smaller version of the game's logo along with "Collector's Edition" on the right side. Unlike the original and Greatest Hits versions, none of the games have any Spyro demo cheats on them.
